articles.content:
Greetings to Colombian President
   Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on July 17 sent a message of greetings to Alvaro Uribe Velez, president of Colombia, on the occasion of its independence day.
 In the belief that the bilateral ties would develop on good terms in mutual interests, the message sincerely wished the president success in his noble work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Colombian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Colombian FM
   Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Colombian counterpart Carolina Barco on the occasion of the independence day of Colombia.
 The message expressed the belief that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.
